title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park               News   The news section offers the most up to date park news information, and features the park newspaper.         Photos & Multimedia    Experience photo galleries and multimedia presentations of the Civil War Defenses of Washington both past and present.               History & Culture    An overview of the history revolving around the Civil War Defense of Washington including information on notable people, places, and stories        Nature   The Forts are home to wildlife and native plants, and host a variety of valuable natural resources.        Education   Information on bringing the Civil War Defenses of Washington into your classroom and education.               Kids & Youth   Kids don't just read about history, become a part of it! Learn about our Junior Ranger Program.        Management   The National Park Service Civil War Defenses of Washington sites are under the management of three separate units.
